name: Balls n Walls: Break Brick Now
name_original: Balls n Walls: Break Brick Now
description:
Balls n Walls is a new and exciting brick breaking game. It is fun, it is relaxing and it has amazing wow moments. You’ll have challenging and fun moments all the time!

Just swipe, aim and launch the balls and break bricks all day.

Get the highest score and pass the levels every time with amazing power ups.
Have Fun!

Features:
Free to play
Simple fun control
Awesome colors
Best highscore with friends
No wi-fi needed
The balls go to wherever you touch.
Clear the stages by removing bricks on the board.
Tons of stages
One handheld gameplay.

----
